ai.title: SaidAI Assistant
ai.greeting: Hey! I'm SaidAI, your virtual assistant. Ask me anything about Said's skills, projects, or experience!

responses.skills: Said is a Full Stack Engineer specializing in React, Node.js, Python, and AWS. He builds scalable web applications and integrates AI/ML into production systems.
responses.projects: Check out the Projects window! Highlights include this OS-style portfolio, AI-powered analytics platforms, and interactive 3D web experiences.
responses.contact: Email: said.elamri.evil@gmail.com | GitHub: github.com/saidElamri | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/saidelamri
responses.experience: Said has years of experience building production-grade applications, from startup MVPs to enterprise solutions.
responses.hire: Looking to hire? Said is available for full-time roles and contract work. Email: said.elamri.evil@gmail.com
responses.default: I can help you learn about Said's skills, projects, experience, or how to get in touch.
responses.hello: Hello! Great to meet you. What would you like to know about Said?
